data.name: Sample - Active Directory - 2.4.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Active Directory" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Add Object
workflows.description: Add an object entry of User, Group, Computer or Organization Unit (OU) type in Active Directory based on the type of object and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Specific Computer Details
workflows.description: Get specific Computers details  from Active Directory based on SamAccount Name.

" }

workflows.description: Removes Active Directory Users or Computers from a Group

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

arguments.name: Active Directory
arguments.mock_result:
{
  "data": {
    "cookie": null,
    "entries": [
      {
        "dn": "CN={{vars.indicator_value}} lastname,CN=Users,DC=cyops-test,DC=com",
        "attributes": {
          "cn": "{{vars.indicator_value}} lastname",
          "sn": "lastname",
          "mail": "flastname@fortinet.com",
          "name": "{{vars.indicator_value}} lastname",
          "codePage": 0,
          "memberOf": [
            "CN=Admin,CN=cyops,DC=cyops-test,DC=com"
          ],
          "givenName": "{{vars.indicator_value}}",
          "lastLogon": null,
          "objectSid": null,
          "adminCount": 1,
          "lastLogoff": null,
          "logonCount": 0,
          "objectGUID": null,
          "pwdLastSet": 1656087282,
          "uSNChanged": 12814,
          "uSNCreated": 12794,
          "badPwdCount": 0,
          "countryCode": 0,
          "description": [
            "Senior Manager"
          ],
          "displayName": "{{vars.indicator_value}} lastname",
          "objectClass": [
            "top",
            "person",
            "organizationalPerson",
            "user"
          ],
          "whenChanged": 1656089274,
          "whenCreated": 1656087282,
          "instanceType": 4,
          "accountExpires": 253402300799,
          "objectCategory": "CN=Person,CN=Schema,CN=Config,DC=cyops-test,DC=com",
          "primaryGroupID": 513,
          "sAMAccountName": "{{vars.indicator_value}}",
          "sAMAccountType": "SAM_NORMAL_USER_ACCOUNT",
          "badPasswordTime": null,
          "telephoneNumber": "567489285",
          "distinguishedName": "CN={{vars.indicator_value}} lastname,CN=Users,DC=cyops-test,DC=com",
          "userPrincipalName": "{{vars.indicator_value}}@fortinet-test.com",
          "userAccountControl": "NORMAL_ACCOUNT",
          "dSCorePropagationData": [
            1656089274,
            null
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
  },
  "status": "Success",
  "message": "",
  "operation": null
}

workflows.name: Enable Computer
workflows.description: Enables the computer account based on the Distinguished Names or SamAccount Name of the computer object.

workflows.name: Force Password Reset For Next Login
workflows.description: Forces specific Active Directory users to reset their password when they next log on to Active Directory. You can specify the user who requires to reset their password based on the SamAccount Name, Email, or Distinguished Name (DN) of the user.
